citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the family Thermoactinomycetaceae Matsuo et al. 2006 emend. Yassin et al. 2009

Thermoactinomycetaceae (Ther′mo.ac.ti.no.my.ce.ta′ce.ae. N.L. masc. n. Thermoactinomyces type genus of the family; -aceae ending to denote a family; N.L. fem. pl. n. Thermoactinomycetaceae the Thermoactinomyces family).

The description of the family Thermoactinomycetaceae is as given by Yassin et al. (2009), with the following amendment: cell walls contain meso-diaminopimelic acid (meso-DAP) or ll-diaminopimelic acid (ll-DAP).
